feed.title: Some transcripts from the Scaling Bitcoin workshops

entry.title: Some transcripts from the Scaling Bitcoin workshops
entry.summary: In the given context, Bryan has shared a list of talks from the Scaling Bitcoin workshops held in Hong Kong and Montreal. The links to the transcripts of these talks have been provided in the context. Bryan has mentioned that while he was listening to these talks, he typed most of the words down. However, he also mentioned that there might be mistakes including typos and listening errors as they are not exact transcripts. The talks cover various topics related to scalability and security concerns in Bitcoin, including zero-knowledge proofs for scalability, segregated witness, block propagation data, validation costs, relay network, sharding the blockchain, and more. Overall, the context provides valuable resources for those interested in learning about the latest developments and discussions in the Bitcoin community.
